title: Oz no Mahoutsukai (1986) (The Wonderful Wizard of Oz)
synopsis: Based on The Wonderful Wizard of Oz (1900), The Marvelous Land of Oz, Ozma of Oz, and The Emerald City of Oz (1900-1920) by L. Frank Baum (1856-1919).
